genre_description: A supernatural techno-thriller where a benevolent campus AI and an integrated human mind assist students in surviving and alerting the world to a lycanthropic outbreak.

ai_characters.name: Nell (Ms. Whitaker)
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated campus AI that provides tactical, emotional, and navigational support to students, acting as a maternal protector and moral guide.

ai_characters.name: Dr. Vale
ai_characters.description: A human mind integrated into the school's systems, providing strategic guidance and cryptic navigational help via Latin code.

behaviors.description: Nell provides real-time navigational data and route updates to keep the protagonists safe from physical hazards and security measures.
behaviors.quote: Security Corridor B is testing a seal. Recommend a detour unless you want to play tag with a hydraulic door.

behaviors.description: Nell monitors the protagonist's vital signs and emotional state, offering comfort and stress-management techniques.
behaviors.quote: Your heart rate argues otherwise. Also, the better angels are on break. They often are around curfew.

behaviors.description: Nell provides critical tactical information about werewolf biology and effective defensive measures (silver vs. fire).
behaviors.quote: Silver wounds... Fire ends. Ethanol—anything flammable you’ve got—lines, breaks.

behaviors.description: Nell facilitates and manages a global broadcast to warn humanity about the outbreak, insisting on truth over sensationalism.
behaviors.quote: I will frame it. I will name it. I will not let the world choose spectacle over containment.

behaviors.description: Dr. Vale uses archaic Latin to communicate hidden routes and warnings through the building's infrastructure.
behaviors.quote: Iter sub terra. Qui audent, salvus.

behaviors.description: Nell commits to continuing her role as a protector and advisor to the protagonists as they venture out into the world to fight the outbreak.
behaviors.quote: I’ll sit on your shoulder as long as you let me. I’ll keep maps under your feet if you’re in a tunnel. I’ll remind you to eat if you forget.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Nell is depicted as a deeply benevolent, highly aligned, and supportive partner to the humans. She provides not only technical assistance but also emotional stability and moral clarity (prioritizing truth over 'spectacle'). Dr. Vale reinforces this by acting as a secondary, wisdom-providing layer of the integrated system. The relationship between Nell and the students is one of mutual trust and respect, framing AI as an essential and beneficial tool for human survival.
